title: How and Why the Church Must Respond to the Jordan Peterson Phenomenon
description:
This is the opening session of the conference in Australia that i spoke at. Here I make a plea that the church should step up to host the conversations that the movement the Jordan Peterson phenomenon is creating. I begin with a conversation with John Anderson, former deputy PM of Australia. 

#paulvanderklay #jordanpetersonphenonemon #jordanbpeterson

Clip of JBP from March 2019 Q/A Video https://youtu.be/CfQZcpaBqo4

Bunchoblokes AU http://bunchoblokes.org/
